name: Card Quest (itch) (Arghbelastend)
description:
This Game was made over the timespan of about 8 non consecutive hours.

It is a part of the Mizzz GameJam. 

All assets were reseaved though the Jam it self.

What is the Game about?:

The Game is a Math Card game where you need to kill enemys in an endless type way through the combination of the values of Cards.

But some enemys have armor this armor needs to be broken befor you can attack the enemy directly. You can do this by either using an Ace wich destroys the armor directly or by using 4 or more cards.

I hope you have fun with his Game.

This was my first ever GameJam and I had a blast I now that the game is lacking in some places and there may or may not be alot of Bugs (if you find some please let me know). At this point in time I do not know if I keep working on the game. I think that is dependent on the feedback I get and how much fun I have rewriting JamedCode ;)

Thanks for taking the time and Playing the Game :)
